amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the Treasury Department to design or develop a Central Bank Digital Currency, or establish a United States Central Bank Digital Currency as legal tender.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
